text: Research Question Order: Investigations of the Structure and… The structure and hydrogen bonding of water molecules provides this unique solvent with properties essential to many physical, chemica… https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/jp9806011 Choosing claim Hydrogen bonding gives water unique properties. 1 Finding data - 3 to 5 (3 for ﬁnal)2 Develop Research Question (rough) How does hydrogen bonding explain water’s unusually high surface tension compared to other liquids? 1 Draft Rationale2 Reﬁne Research Question Maybe address strength and directionality of hydrogen bonding in water molecules, compare to other molecular liquids of similar molecular weight 3
